kw.name: Launch Browser
kw.doc: ***Description:***

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Wait And Click Element
kw.doc: ***Description:***

kw.name: Wait For Element
kw.doc: ***Description:***

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is not visible.
